column2: Berkshire resumes buying Phillips 66 stock Jan 30 Berkshire Hathaway Inc
column3: the conglomerate run by Warren Buffett
column4: has resumed its purchases of Phillips 66 stock
column5: and spent roughly $832 million in January to boost its stake even as the oil refiner's profit margins narrowed.

column2: Coca-Cola buys stake in Nigerian juice and dairy firm Chi LAGOS
column3: Jan 30 The Coca-Cola Company has bought a 40-percent stake in Nigerian juice and dairy firm Chi Ltd from unlisted European firm TGI Group
column4: both companies said in a statement on Saturday.
